name: Arrival
slogan: Fully electric commercial vehicles for huge global impact
description:
ARRIVAL is a technology company making vehicles the way they should be - fully electric, digitally connected, and smart. We are working with some of the world's leading businesses and governments with the goal to re-define how cities look, think and feel. Our vehicles will be 100% built by robots and are autonomous-ready.

We recently announced a trial with the Royal Mail, we are the Official Electric Truck Partner of the FIA Formula E Championship, and we supply the components to the first fully electric and driverless race car and racing series, Roborace.

Function and form without compromise. Our core components: motors, power electronics, battery systems, HMI and LV systems are 100% designed and manufactured in-house.

We’ve assembled some of the finest minds in software, engineering, AI and robotics and we need to grow, but grow slowly to ensure only the world's best come and join us.

team.name: Joe Griston
team.bioHtml: Chief of Talent @ Arrival. I source, architect and scale world-class teams for tech companies that disrupt the planet.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
ARRIVAL is a technology company making vehicles the way they should be - fully electric, digitally connected, and smart. We are working with some of the world's leading businesses and governments with the goal to re-define how cities look, think and feel. Our vehicles will be 100% built by robots and are autonomous-ready.

We recently announced a trial with the Royal Mail, we are the Official Electric Truck Partner of the FIA Formula E Championship, and we supply the components to the first fully electric and driverless race car and racing series, Roborace.

We’ve assembled some of the finest minds in software, engineering, AI and robotics. We are seeking a ‘Software Engineer for our Autonomous Guidance System to contribute to the development of software solutions for next-generation Autonomous Guided Vehicles (AGV) and Mobile Robots (MR).

Responsibilities:

- Tackle the challenge of autonomous guidance through innovative software solutions 
   that interface with all components of AGVs and MRs.
- Contribute to the development of AI solutions to enable perception, learning, and 
  navigation within complex environments, whilst avoiding people and obstacles.
- Contribute to the design of the software infrastructure of both the on-board and 
  operations control stacks of AGV&MR.
- Design and develop sensor fused software frameworks and algorithms for 
  autonomous drive and integrate them with powertrain and actuation systems.
- Build new concepts and ground-breaking solutions that shape the future of 
  AGV&MR.

Expertise:

- BSc/MSc degree in Computer Science, Robotics or an equivalent engineering field.
- At least 3 years of hands-on experience in embedded software development 
  (university counts).
- Experience in robotics perception and developing sensor (Camera, RADAR, LIDAR) 
  and or (WIFI/GNSS/Cellular) fusion frameworks.
- Experience with classical and/or deep learning based computer vision (object 
  detection, classification, segmentation).
- Experience programming in one or more of the following languages: C/C++, Python 
  (Linux environment).
- Knowledge of software engineering principles, practices and techniques including 
  testability, maintainability, and scalability.

We’d love it if you have:

- A hunger to learn.
- A huge desire to achieve.
- The ability to work in a fast moving meritocracy where every employee looks to 
  constantly improve themselves and their company.

A career with Arrival will expose you to the bare-bones of a highly ambitious and entrepreneurial technology company, so if you’re interested in creating the future, not just talking about it, we’d love to hear from you.
